[Minchin Jas. Can 4 days sick be counted as annual leave?]
This letter was returned to M on 14 June 1894 minuted: 'In future carry out instruction re reporting absence by Telegraph'. M returned the file on 18 June. M had been instructed on 13 October 1893, ‘Report next absence by telegram’, after reporting an earlier absence of Minchin’s due to ill-health.
